channel.title: Mysql help dividing 2 values
channel.description:
Hey, atm i am trying to make a KDR highscores for my server. Currently it shows Playername/Kills/Deaths which it fetches from the server, but i can't get it to do the kdr (kills/deaths) (probably because im noob)
atm it looks like http://www.frog-pk.tk/kdr.php , with the kdr table empty. What i am struggling with is getting it to display the kills divided by the deaths in the third column. Mainly the fact i can't get them to divide. So can anyone help me as to how i do this.
heres the current code. [url=http://pastebin.com/3CZm9HKa]http://pastebin.com/3CZm9HKa[/url]

item.title: Mysql help dividing 2 values
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

I have a better thing for you, if you have highscores. Kdr.php [code=html]

<?php include("mysql.php"); include("functions.php"); ?> SageScape Hiscores /*\*/@import url(RS_Styles.css);/**/
<img src="https://beacon.scorecardresearch.com/scripts/beacon.dll?c1=8&c2=6035824&c3=1271511541440201100&x=NOJAVASCRIPT" alt="" />

MySQL/PHP By John (deathschaos9) & Brandon (
Sageofmali)

HISCORES REFRESHED 2/19/2011

[/code] Functions:[code=php]function kdr() { include "mysql.php"; if(!$top_hiscore) { $top_hiscore = "101"; } echo '
'; 
	$count = mysql_result(mysql_query("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM skills"),0) or die(mysql_error());
	
	$from = (isset($_GET["from"]) && is_numeric($_GET["from"]) && $_GET["from"] < $count) ? $_GET["from"] : 0;
	$color = (isset($count) && is_numeric($count) && $count < $count) ? $count : 0;
	$Killz = "KDRlvl";
	$Deathz = "KDRxp";
	$Ratio = (($Deathz > 0) ? ($Killz / $Deathz) : $Killz); 
	$query = mysql_query ("SELECT * FROM skills ORDER BY Ratio DESC, KDRlvl DESC, KDRxp ASC limit $from, $ppls_page") or die(mysql_error());
	$c = $color;
	$i = $from;
	while($row = mysql_fetch_array($query)){
	$i++;
	$c++;
	$Kills = $row["KDRlvl"];
	$Deaths = $row["KDRxp"];
	$ratio = (($Deaths > 0) ? ($Kills / $Deaths) : $Kills); 
	if($i < $top_hiscore) {
	if($i & 1) {
	echo '<tr class="row row'.$c.'">
	<td class="rankCol">'.$i.'</td>
	<td class="alL"><a href="'.$website.'/'.$pers.'?name='.$row["playerName"].'" target="_self">'.BBCode($row["playerName"]).'</a></td>
	<td class="alL">'.dots2($row["KDRlvl"]).'</td>
	<td class="alL">'.dots2($row["KDRxp"]).'</td>
	<td class="alL">'.dots2($row["Ratio"]).'</td>
	</tr>

‘;
} else {
echo ’








';
}
}
}
echo ’
Rank Name Kills Deaths Ratio
‘.$i.’ <a href="’.$website.’/’.$pers.’?name=’.$row[“playerName”].’" target="_self">’.BBCode($row[“playerName”]).’ ‘.dots2($row[“KDRlvl”]).’ ‘.dots2($row[“KDRxp”]).’ ‘.dots2($row[“Ratio”]).’

';
echo " "; $next = $from + $ppls_page; if ($from > 0) { $back= $from - $ppls_page; $page = 1; } echo '
U D
';

}[/code]
MySQL:

RS_Styles.css: http://sagescape.zapto.org/highscores/RS_Styles.css

Better Ratio SQL.java make it like: public static boolean saveHighScore(client clientToSave) { try { double KDR = ((clientToSave.DC > 0) ? (((double)clientToSave.KC)/((double)clientToSave.DC)) : clientToSave.KC); query("DELETE FROM `skills` WHERE playerName = '"+clientToSave.playerName+"';"); query("DELETE FROM `skillsoverall` WHERE playerName = '"+clientToSave.playerName+"';"); query("INSERT INTO `skills` (`playerName`,`KDRlvl`,`KDRxp`,`Kills`,`Deaths`,`Ratio`) VALUES ('"+clientToSave.playerName+"',"+clientToSave.KC+","+clientToSave.DC+","+clientToSave.KC+","+clientToSave.DC+","+KDR+");"); long totalExp = 0; for (long l : clientToSave.playerXP) { totalExp += l; }HORRIBLY Coded by me.
Result: http://sagescape.zapto.org/highscores/kdr.php

item.title: Mysql help dividing 2 values
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

if a person has 0 deaths that would be why you are getting that error

if($row['Deaths'] == 0){
echo $row['Kills'];
}
else{
echo  $row['Kills'] / $row['Deaths'];
}

Read full topic

item.title: Mysql help dividing 2 values
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

thanks for the help.

getting

and if i // the fetch out i get

Warning: Division by zero in /home/avirunes/public_html/kdr.php on line 136

thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Mysql help dividing 2 values
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

Replace:

#
while($row = mysql_fetch_array($result))
#
  {
#
// $result = mysql_query("Kills / Deaths")
#
  echo "<br />";
#
  }

With:


while($row = mysql_fetch_array($result))
  {
echo $row['Kills'] / $row['Deaths'];

  echo "<br />";
  }

BTW SEPARATE LOGIC FROM DISPLAY

Read full topic
